app.completeDescription:
Fountation is a powerful open-source platform designed to accelerate enterprise application development.
Built as a ready-to-use enterprise framework, it leverages modern microservice architecture for effortless scalability and Reactive Programming to eliminate blocking issues, ensuring high performance and resilience.
With Fountation, you can innovate faster, scale seamlessly, and deliver enterprise-grade solutions with confidence

formatError.username: Wrong username format, need minimum 8 character and no special character
